thread.title: Let Kendall Jenner Convince You to Wear Spring's Most Comfortable Trend
thread.title_full: Let Kendall Jenner Convince You to Wear Spring's Most Comfortable Trend

author: Nikita Ramsinghani
title: Let Kendall Jenner Convince You to Wear Spring's Most Comfortable Trend
text:
Kendall Jenner Wearing Yellow Paperbag-Waist Trousers Let Kendall Jenner Convince You to Wear Spring's Most Comfortable Trend March 16, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Let Kendall Jenner Convince You to Wear Spring's Most Comfortable Trend 
Kendall Jenner was spotted out in Calabasas, CA, taking cues from Kate Middleton's ability to get the most mileage out of her wardrobe. The supermodel rewore her daytime lingerie top , but it was her bright yellow pants that caught our attention. So what exactly were her billowy bottoms called? Dubbed paperbag-waist trousers, the style is popping up everywhere for Spring, and Kendall's are from her Drop One collection with sister Kylie . 
Fellow model and friend of Kendall Gigi Hadid also sported a similar pair , though hers were beige. While Gigi styled the pants with a gray long-sleeved crop top and brogues, Kendall showed us another interesting way to wear the unconventional pants with a full-on monochromatic look and oversize hoop earrings. Scroll on for more photos and looks you can shop. Related:
